entry.title: ubuntu source maintained by CUHK
entry.content:
sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list replace the original content with following source list

deb http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise main restricted universe multiverse deb http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise-security main restricted universe multiverse deb http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise-backports main restricted universe multiverse deb http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise-proposed main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise-security main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise-backports main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://ftp.cuhk.edu.hk/pub/Linux/ubuntu precise-proposed main restricted universe

sudo apt-get update

sudo apt-get upgrade
